subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The United States Olympic Committee reached a temporary compromise with the International Olympic Committee in their dispute over revenue sharing. Officials from the organizations met in Denver and agreed to wait until 2013 to discuss the issue. At that time, they will restart talks about redistributing the revenue from global sponsorship partners and television contracts. Any changes to the agreement would be put in after 2020.
